ch0364_00_masahito/0101_0701_01_10:
Ga ha ha! You made it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0364_00_masahito/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s aim to be the greatest Pokémon
Trainers today—and climb to the top!
ch0364_00_masahito/7101_0701_01_10:
There are so many different mountains
around the world!
ch0364_00_masahito/7101_0701_02_10:
The secluded Mt. Silver is pretty neat,
but so is Mount Hokulani, in the lively
tourist destination Alola!
ch0364_00_masahito/7101_0701_03_10:
Apparently you can take a bus to the summit,
but mountains are meant to be climbed!
What a waste it’d be to take a shortcut!
ch0364_00_masahito/7105_0701_01_10:
Mountains or beach—which do you prefer,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0364_00_masahito/7105_0701_02_10:
Mountains are great! I feel so good reaching
the top. And meals at the peak are the best!
ch0364_00_masahito/7105_0701_03_10:
BUT! Be careful of wild Pokémon. Make sure
you’re prepared!
ch0364_00_masahito/1701_0702_01_10:
Don’t worry about it! As you can see,
I’m big on generosity! Ga ha ha!
ch0364_00_masahito/2501_0701_01_10:
If you come across an unfamiliar mushroom,
don’t eat it.
ch0364_00_masahito/2501_0701_02_10:
Er, apparently a hiker friend of mine once
ate a poisonous mushroom...
ch0364_00_masahito/2501_0701_03_10:
and he couldn’t stop laughing! What a
nightmare!
ch0364_00_masahito/2501_0702_01_10: It’s hard to tell if a mushroom is poisonous!
ch0364_00_masahito/2501_0702_02_10:
And sometimes, you might mistake Pokémon
for a mushroom!
ch0364_00_masahito/2501_0702_03_10:
Parasect, Shroomish, Foongus...
Beware their spores!
ch0364_00_masahito/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Up and at ’em! The mountains call!
ch0364_00_masahito/3003_0701_01_10:
Nothing beats a picnic with a beautiful
mountain view! What do you say?
ch0364_00_masahito/3005_0701_01_10:
The mountains can get dangerous at night.
Let’s rest at the lodge!
